name: Fix it!
description:
Fix all your robots before time runs out!

Be careful, each robot got different parts broken and those parts can match only some specfic pieces.

Credits:

Javier Talavera: designer, programmer, 2d artist.

Lucía Ortuño: designer, programmer, 2d artist.

Julen Justo: designer, programmer, composer.

Álvaro Roger: designer, programmer, some vfx.
